001package com.technototes.vision.hardware;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004
005import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.hardware.camera.WebcamName;
006
007import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvCameraFactory;
008import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvSwitchableWebcam;
009
010import com.technototes.library.hardware.DummyDevice;
011import com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDevice;
012
013@SuppressWarnings("unused")
014public class SwitchableWebcam extends Camera<OpenCvSwitchableWebcam, DummyDevice<WebcamName[]>> {
015
016    private final Webcam[] devices;
017
018    public SwitchableWebcam(WebcamName... device) {
019        super(new DummyDevice<>(device));
020        devices = Arrays.stream(device).map(Webcam::new).toArray(Webcam[]::new);
021    }
022
023    public SwitchableWebcam(String... device) {
024        this(Arrays.stream(device)
025                .map((s) -> hardwareMap.get(WebcamName.class, s))
026                .toArray(WebcamName[]::new));
027    }
028
029    public SwitchableWebcam(Webcam... device) {
030        this(Arrays.stream(device).map(HardwareDevice::getDevice).toArray(WebcamName[]::new));
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public OpenCvSwitchableWebcam createCamera() {
035        return OpenCvCameraFactory.getInstance()
036                .createSwitchableWebcam(
037                        hardwareMap
038                                .appContext
039                                .getResources()
040                                .getIdentifier("cameraMonitorViewId", "id", hardwareMap.appContext.getPackageName()),
041                        getDevice().get());
042    }
043
044    public SwitchableWebcam setActiveCamera(Webcam w) {
045        return setActiveCamera(w.getDevice());
046    }
047
048    public SwitchableWebcam setActiveCamera(WebcamName device) {
049        openCvCamera.setActiveCamera(device);
050        return this;
051    }
052
053    public SwitchableWebcam setActiveCamera(String device) {
054        return setActiveCamera(hardwareMap.get(WebcamName.class, device));
055    }
056
057    public Webcam getActiveCamera() {
058        for (Webcam c : devices) {
059            if (c.openCvCamera == openCvCamera) {
060                return c;
061            }
062        }
063        return null;
064    }
065}
